text: Awaiting Easterly Winds

Sevilbarra dreams of a swordsmanship lesson with Krelkulkil. It quickly turns into a nightmare, with a blood-drenched, resentful Keralbarra lying on the ground and Krelkulkil—demon blade in hand—rushing in to attack.
trans: 萨比尔巴拉梦到了和卡拉库拉奇尔的剑术练习，但是很快梦境变成了噩梦，他看到浑身是血的库拉芭拉，随后，握着妖刀的卡拉库拉奇尔向他袭来。

name: Krelkulkil
text: Yah! Haaah!

name: Sevilbarra
text: Nuh-uh-uh! Strike harder, faster!
trans: 不行不行，再快一点，用力一点！

text: At the dojo's garden, Krelkulkil is receiving sword training from Sevilbarra.
trans: 在道场的院子里，卡拉库拉奇尔正在接受萨比尔巴拉的剑术训练。

text: He desperately throws his weight into every wooden sword swing as per Sevilbarra's instructions.
trans: 他努力地按照萨比尔巴拉所指示的那样挥舞着木刀。

text: However, it is all but clear that Krelkulkil is completely devoid of talent with a sword.
trans: 但是很明显卡拉库拉奇尔一丁点这方面的天赋都没有。

name: Krelkulkil
text: Urgh!

name: Krelkulkil
text: Taah! Hyaaah!

name: Sevilbarra
text: You leave too many openings!

name: Krelkulkil
text: Augh...
Taking a single blow from Sevilbarra, Krelkulkil collapses to the ground while clutching his side.
trans: 被萨比尔巴拉一击击中，卡拉库拉奇尔捂着侧腹倒在地上。

name: Sevilbarra
text: Ready to give up?

name: Krelkulkil
text: Far from it!

name: Sevilbarra
text: Haha, that's what I like to hear!
The two ready their swords again.
But a voice calls out just before the bout can continue.
trans: 但是在他们想要重新开始练习的时候——

name: Keralbarra
text: Geez, Brother, take it easy on him!

name: Sevilbarra
text: Keralbarra! Don't get in the way of our training!
trans: 库拉芭拉，不要中途插进来打扰我们练习。

name: Keralbarra
text: You're taking it too far! Have you forgotten Krel's still new to all this?
trans: 你做的太过火了，你忘了卡拉还完全是一个新手吗？

name: Sevilbarra
text: If I let up, he's never gonna get any better!
trans: 要是我放水的话，他就不能变强啦！

name: Keralbarra
text: Krel, you hanging in there okay? Show me where you're hurt.
trans: 卡拉酱，你还好吗？让我看看你哪里受伤了。

name: Krelkulkil
text: Ah... I'm okay...
Keralbarra pays her protesting brother no attention as she helps prop up a staggering Krelkulkil.
trans: 库拉芭拉无视萨比尔巴拉的抗议，搀扶起几乎站不稳的卡拉库拉奇尔。

name: Keralbarra
text: Maybe you're just not cut out for swordsmanship. No need to push yourself so hard, okay?
trans: 果然你还不是很适合剑术，不要勉强自己哦？

name: Krelkulkil
text: I need to become stronger to protect you...
trans: 我需要变得更强才能保护你……

name: Keralbarra
text: Krelkulkil...

name: Sevilbarra
text: Keralbarra?

name: Keralbarra
text: That wouldn't make a difference. As strong as my brother was, he failed to protect me.
trans: 变强有什么用吗，哥哥那么强，也没能保护我。

name: Keralbarra
text: Why didn't you save me, Brother...

name: Sevilbarra
text: Keralbarra!
Still reeling from his little sister's scorn, the surrounding environment suddenly transforms into a sea of blood.
trans: 还没有从妹妹的质问中缓过神来，周围一下子就变成了血海。

name: Sevilbarra
text: What... is this...

name: Keralbarra
text: It hurts so much...

name: Keralbarra
text: I never... wanted to die...

name: Keralbarra
text: Why... didn't you... save me... Brother...
trans: 为什么……哥哥……没有……拯救我……

text: Sevilbarra freezes at the sight of his sister's blood-drenched body and resentful eyes.
trans: 萨比尔巴拉身体僵硬地看着妹妹染血的身躯和怨恨的眼睛。

name: Sevilbarra
text: Krelkulkil...
Krelkulkil is now brandishing a demon blade and glares hatefully at Sevilbarra.
trans: 卡拉库拉奇尔拿着妖刀，痛恨地盯着萨比尔巴拉。

name: Keralbarra
text: Ugh, the pain... I'm so scared... I can't take it...
trans: 好痛啊……好害怕……再也无法忍受了……

name: Krelkulkil
text: Sevilbarra...

name: Krelkulkil
text: Why! How did it come to this? You were right there!
trans: 为什么？为什么！你当时就在那里！

name: Krelkulkil
text: What the heck were you doing when the blood was draining from her body!
trans: 当她的身躯喷出鲜血的时候，你在干什么！

name: Krelkulkil
text: Why did Keralbarra have to die!

name: Krelkulkil
text: Why, why, why!
Demon blade drawn, Krelkulkil rushes at his mentor.
trans: 卡拉库拉奇尔拔出妖刀，猛然向萨比尔巴拉袭来。
